channel.title: RP Chat in chat.
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "RP Chat in chat."

item.title: RP Chat in chat.
item.content:encoded:
I suggest adding an RP Chat tab to the chat. I have already set one up at #bvsrp

So all that would be needed to do would be to add the tab. Just a suggestion and I feel if i put this here more would see and then it would likely get put into action if a lot want it.
